thread.title: Global military spending rises but Russia sees a fall

title: Global military spending rises but Russia sees a fall
text:
Global military spending rises but Russia sees a fall 2:12pm EDT - 01:34
Russian military spending fell by a fifth last year, its first decline in nearly two decades. As Francis Maguire reports, the report by the defence think-tank SIPRI also suggests tighter purse-strings are likely to affect Moscow's military activity ahead, while globally military spending is up.
